:::: {.panel-tabset group="dimension"}

#### 2020
<!-- Map -->
```{=html}
<div class="map-container" id="bau2020lulc" data-sync-key="lulc">
  <canvas></canvas>
  <div class="zoom">
    <button class="out">-</button>
    <button class="in">+</button>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    createInteractiveMap('bau2020lulc', 'data/lulc/lulc-bau-2020.png', 'en', 'lulc');
});
</script>
```
<!-- Chart -->
```{=html}
<!-- Chart container -->
<div class="chart-container" style="position: relative; height: 400px; width: 100%;">
  <canvas id="bau2020Chart"></canvas>
</div>

<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    makeChart(
      "bau2020Chart",
      "data/lulc/lulc-bau-2020.json",
      "data/lulc/LULC_pal.json",
      "Percentage Area of Land Use Classes in 2020"
    );
  });
</script>
```

#### Change
<!-- Map -->
```{=html}
<div class="map-container" id="bau-change-map" data-sync-key="lulc">
  <canvas></canvas>
  <div class="zoom">
    <button class="out">-</button>
    <button class="in">+</button>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Buttons container -->
<div id="bau-landuse-buttons"></div>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Create map instance with a base map (could be a default "overview" PNG)
  const mapInst = createInteractiveMap(
    'bau-change-map',
    'data/lulc/bau-forested_areas-change.png', // pick a default class map to load first
    'en',
    false
  );

  // Attach land-use buttons for scenario "bau"
  attachLandUseButtons(mapInst, 'bau-landuse-buttons', 'data/lulc/LULC_pal.json', 'bau');
});
</script>
```
<!-- Chart -->
```{=html}
<!-- Chart container -->
```
